food.name: Central Iowa Shelter & Services Food Pantry
food.notes: No ID required. Walk-ins welcome. Serves families & individuals. Accepts donations of food and paper products; volunteers welcome. Call ahead to confirm hours. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
food.donationInfo: Donations of canned goods, fresh produce, and paper products accepted; volunteer opportunities available. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

food.name: Food Bank of Iowa Distribution Center
food.address: 1660 NE Broadway Ave, Des Moines, IA 50313
food.notes: Major food bank serving central Iowa. Find partners and locations through their site. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
food.donationInfo: Accepts financial donations online; contact office for food drop-off details. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

food.name: DMARC Food Pantry Network – Central
food.notes: Part of the DMARC pantry network. Contact for exact schedule. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
food.donationInfo: Donate non-perishable and fresh/frozen food at the DMARC warehouse: 100 Army Post Rd, Des Moines, IA 50315, Mon–Fri 11AM–3PM. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

food.name: St. Vincent de Paul Food Pantry (Des Moines)
food.notes: Food pantry through social services; hours vary, appointments recommended. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
food.donationInfo: Contact St. Vincent de Paul for donation options and volunteer opportunities. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

food.name: West Des Moines Community Food Pantry (DMARC site)
food.notes: City pantry site in partnership with DMARC; personal care items also available. Drop-offs accepted during listed hours. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
food.donationInfo: Donations of food or personal care items accepted during pantry hours; contact office for details. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

food.name: Urbandale Food Pantry
food.notes: Serves Urbandale area families. Walk-ins accepted.
food.donationInfo: Donations and volunteer opportunities available; contact pantry directly for details. :contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}
